## matchIsMatchAll variable

Type guard to check if a [Match](./core.match.md) is a [MatchAll](./core.matchall.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
matchIsMatchAll: (match: Match) => match is MatchAll
```
